column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The point of this review though
column2: is to commend the service. Today we went for lunch. There was a minor issue with the bowl I got
column3: the kind of thing that happens anywhere so I won't even go into detail. The waiter took the bowl away
column4: and sent the manager who graciously comped the meal
column5: even though there was no need for that and we didn't expect it. Just made me love this place even more. Quality noodles
column8: and thoughtfully prepared add-ins. It's a great addition to the Houston dining scene.
